channel.title: SkinsOnline.tv - Website Designs
channel.description:
It's been absolutely ages since I've posted here @ MITB.. I just wanted to know what you thought of the designs for my latest site. It's going to display streaming episodes all three seasons of Skins.
Looking for critique on the layout & overall aesthetics. When it's coded i'll repost. I've also posted in the graphics section, just cause I wasn't sure which would be more appropriate.
[img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww10/xaec/index.png[/img]
[img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww10/xaec/series1.png[/img]
[img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww10/xaec/series2.png[/img]
[img]http://i700.photobucket.com/albums/ww10/xaec/series3.png[/img]
Apologies for shit quality! x

item.title: SkinsOnline.tv - Website Designs
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

SomethingToHide:

Although I’m color blind, I aced my Color Theory class and I can tell when colors do, and don’t, look good together.

My dad is like that, cant tell what most colours are but he paints cars for a living, custom designs and just re-sprays or repairing scratches and he manages to get the colours perfect without using a machine most of the time

Read full topic

item.title: SkinsOnline.tv - Website Designs
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:9, topic:266981”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=352501.msg2727615#msg2727615 date=1238466630]
Although I’m color blind, I aced my Color Theory class and I can tell when colors do, and don’t, look good together.
[/quote]

Why are you so good?

@JV: It’s pretty nice although the search box(?) is a bit big, and too many gradients, may be slow to load for 56Kbers?[/quote]

I don’t know.
My teacher said I’d be perfect in the class because of lot of the work is with values, which I’m a lot better with because of my eyes.

As for as colors working together, I love colors. A lot. Ironic I know. I feel that my eyes are pretty sensitive when it comes to them (despite the fact that a few of them look like other colors) and they just feel right sometimes.

This time, they don’t.

Read full topic

item.title: SkinsOnline.tv - Website Designs
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

SomethingToHide:

Although I’m color blind, I aced my Color Theory class and I can tell when colors do, and don’t, look good together.

Why are you so good?

@JV: It’s pretty nice although the search box(?) is a bit big, and too many gradients, may be slow to load for 56Kbers?

item.title: SkinsOnline.tv - Website Designs
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

It isn’t bad.

I like the font choices. Pretty much what I would’ve done. Although I’m a fan of this shit that’s taking over everywhere, I do have crits.

Lose the effects or whatever is on the bold words in the headings. Looks like it’s beveled from the background. Not very attractive. Would do much better with just that plain white text.

The colors for the season groupings don’t fit well in the color scheme.

Although I’m color blind, I aced my Color Theory class and I can tell when colors do, and don’t, look good together.

In this case they don’t.

Read full topic
